description:
Katou Otome is a direct and headstrong student in year one of class four, who as http://anidb.net/ch2349 [Nanami], is a member of the girl`s basketball team. She is usually authoritative to her peers, tolerates nothing but her way and opinion, and does not generally associate with anyone but her trio of friends http://anidb.net/ch41024 [Obuchi Minami], http://anidb.net/ch41025 [Koizumi Natsumi] and http://anidb.net/ch41023 [Mori Kumi]; who together frequently harass and coerce http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha].
Despite her difficult behaviour and personality however, Otome can be particularly tender and shy, especially around http://anidb.net/ch2344 [Makoto], who she has known since junior high school and subsequently developed a crush on.
name: Katou Otome
